item.title: Adding ::master for my 317
item.dc:creator: @pkdave pkdave
item.description:
@pkdave wrote:

Step 1: Open your Source folder and open client.java.

Step 2: Press CTRL + F and type in command.startsWith - search for it.

Step 3: After every command - is a } which means that the command has ended. Press enter after the } and paste in your new command.

Step 4: Save.

Step 5: Compile and turn on your server to test if it works.

Example

if(command.startsWith("spec") && playerRights >= 2){ specialAmount += 500000000; specAttack(); }

As you can see, my command ended with a }
After the } you press enter, and paste in your new command.

if(command.startsWith("spec") && playerRights >= 2){ specialAmount += 500000000; specAttack(); } if(command.startsWith("people")){ sM(""+PlayerHandler.playersInPit+""); }

This is the master one,

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 1) { addSkillXP(14910000, 0); addSkillXP(14910000, 1); addSkillXP(14910000, 2); addSkillXP(14910000, 3); addSkillXP(14910000, 4); addSkillXP(14910000, 5); addSkillXP(14910000, 6); sendMessage("" + playerName + " .. your a nerd.");

Read full topic
